definition: pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Spring gaskets should be added to the ground points, and the connection should be fastened.
sentences.chinese: 各接地连接点应加弹簧垫片，连接紧固可靠。

sentences.english: Top view of chamfered washer or spacer with adjustable inside and outside diameters.
sentences.chinese: 内径和外径都可调整的有切角的垫圈或垫片的俯视图。

sentences.english: Small pads along the bottom keep from scratching your toilet seat.
sentences.chinese: 坐垫的底部还带有小垫片，以免划伤你的坐厕。

sentences.english: Flange form different requirements, the use of gasket are different.
sentences.chinese: 法兰形式不同，要求使用的垫片也不同。

sentences.english: One-piece construction and heavy gasket design assure reliability.
sentences.chinese: 单件构造和重型垫片设计保证了产品的可靠性。

sentences.english: The back - side of the meter contains four (4) non - scratch nickel-plated pads.
sentences.chinese: 仪器背面有四个防刮伤的垫片。

sentences.english: One-piece faceplates with included gaskets permit use in all weather conditions.
sentences.chinese: 含有垫片许可证的单件面板可在任何气候条件下使用。

sentences.english: Ensure the ground clip is on spacer slot.
sentences.chinese: 应确保接地夹片在垫片槽上。

sentences.english: The calculation method for bolt pretightening force of tube side gasket and shell side gasket were proposed.
sentences.chinese: 给出了管程和壳程垫片螺栓预紧力的计算方法。

sentences.english: Fix the top lath of the curtain onto the roller with the screws and washers provided.
sentences.chinese: 用提供的螺丝钉和垫片把卷帘顶部板条固定在卷轴上。

sentences.english: The back of seal liner can print trademarks, logos by the customer-specific.
sentences.chinese: 垫片背面可依客户指定印刷商标，图案等。

sentences.english: The gasket faces of girth flanges shall be machined after final heat treatment.
sentences.chinese: 在最终热处理后翼缘法兰的垫片的端面应进行加工。

sentences.english: Drag onto the page to add washer or spacer with adjustable inside and outside diameters.
sentences.chinese: 内径和外径都可调整的有切角的垫圈或垫片的俯视图。

sentences.english: Examine if the pad plastic pad has already been damaged.
sentences.chinese: 检查塑料垫片是否已损坏。

definition: to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
